description: There have been a lot of men featured in the past “fun in the sun” production, but two of the hottest are easily Max Cameron and Lucas Entertainment Exclusive Model Leo Alexander. So, why wouldn’t the production team pair them up? Max and Leo both have all-American looks (as far as all-American porn stars go, anyway), so they make for a good visual pairing. And, let’s be real: Max loves riding dick, and Leo has THE dick for said activity. Yes, Max does get his turn on Leo, but it’s the other way around that works best. But has Max’s porn career prepared him for a penis as large as Leo Alexander’s? There’s only one way to find out -- watch the action!
title: Max Cameron Rides Every Raw Inch Of Leo Alexander’s Dick
